286 #define hwloc_bitmap_foreach_begin(id, bitmap) \
287 do { \
288  assert(hwloc_bitmap_weight(bitmap) != -1); \
289  for (id = hwloc_bitmap_first(bitmap); \
290  (unsigned) id != (unsigned) -1; \
291  id = hwloc_bitmap_next(bitmap, id)) {
292 
300 #define hwloc_bitmap_foreach_end() \
301  } \
302 } while (0)
